artist: Author: JT Compton; Publisher: The Purple Thistle Center, Vancouver
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, digital illustration of a missile anatomy, helicopter, and an abstracted figure, with letterpress text, printed in offset lithography on wove paper covers; 16 pp.
title: Weapons of Mass Distraction: Corporate Greed. Information War.
